description: This file defines a class 'AzureOpenAITools' that provides an interface to generate images using Azure's OpenAI services, specifically supporting DALL-E models. It includes methods for parameter validation, image generation via API calls, and integration with an agent for handling generated images.

classes.name: AzureOpenAITools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interfacing with Azure OpenAI's image generation services, supporting parameter validation and image creation.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the AzureOpenAITools with configuration parameters, setting up API credentials, endpoint, and image generation settings.

methods.name: _enforce_valid_image_parameters
methods.description: Validates and enforces acceptable values for image generation parameters such as size, style, and number of images.

methods.name: generate_image
methods.description: Generates images based on a prompt using Azure OpenAI, adding the resulting images to the provided agent.
